definition: at or in the very same.../suitable/adequate/fitting/proper/to replace/to regard as/to think/to pawn/(coll.) to fail (a student)
to be/to act as/manage/withstand/when/during/ought/should/match equally/equal/same/obstruct/just at (a time or place)/on the spot/right/just at
classifier for a ream of paper
to order/to command/an order/warrant/writ/to cause/to make sth happen/virtuous/honorific title/season/government position (old)
to wave a chicken feather as a token of authority (idiom); to assume unwarranted authority on the basis of some pretext
pinyin: na2 zhe5 ji1 mao2 dang4 ling4 jian4

sentences.english: The competent authority will release relevant information in due course.
sentences.chinese: 有關部分將當令發佈有關動靜。

sentences.english: You can certainly experiment with whatever vegetables are in season where you are.
sentences.chinese: 當然你可以嘗試用其他各種當令蔬菜。

sentences.english: The stripping pressure for the press tonnage will be calculated with the die closed.
sentences.chinese: 衝牀噸位中的脫料力應爲模具閉當令的壓力。

sentences.english: Nothing says summer quite like the taste of fresh, in-season produce.
sentences.chinese: 習慣上，夏天是品嚐新鮮和當令食品的季節。

sentences.english: And they're not the ones benefiting from the fall in seasonal food prices.
sentences.chinese: 而且他們也沒能從當令食物的降價中受益。

sentences.english: Dangling dry autumn air, easily injured Jinye, the diet should be Ziyin Runfei suitable.
sentences.chinese: 秋季燥氣當令，易傷津液，故飲食應以滋陰潤肺爲宜。

definition: to assist a ruler in governing a country/prime minister
medicinal dietary supplement that helps build up one's health
5-7 am (in the system of two-hour subdivisions used in former times)
Tai Sui, God of the year/archaic name for the planet Jupiter 木星[Mu4 xing1]/nickname for sb who is the most powerful in an area
to seek luck and avoid calamity (idiom)
